caption.p:
SST biases against OISSTv2 for the months July to August. Values are in °C (contour line interval is 1 °C). ( a) CMIP5 ensemble-mean from the historical runs for the years 1982–2005, ( b) LR (T42L31), ( c) MR (T159L62), ( d) HR (T255L62). Maps are created with the NCAR Command Language (NCL) version 6.4.0
41 .
